pull.title: fuzz: Add missing fuzz targets to cmake build
pull.body:
Fixes https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30454#discussion_r1726881676

Can be tested via:

```
PRINT_ALL_FUZZ_TARGETS_AND_ABORT=1 ./bld-autot/src/test/fuzz/fuzz > /tmp/f_autot
PRINT_ALL_FUZZ_TARGETS_AND_ABORT=1 ./bld-cmake/src/test/fuzz/fuzz > /tmp/f_cmake
diff --unified /tmp/{f_autot,f_cmake}

cmake: Add cross-compiling support

To configure CMake for cross-compiling, use
`--toolchain depends/${HOST}/toolchain.cmake` command-line option.

To configure CMake for cross-compiling, use

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage
For detailed information about the code coverage, see the [test coverage report](https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/30712).
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#30717](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30717) (rpc: Add test-only RPCs under `-test=<option>` flag by Prabhat1308)
* [#30685](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30685) (build: Mark `x86_64-linux-gnu` release binaries as CET-enabled by hebasto)
* [#30634](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30634) (ci: Use clang-19 from apt.llvm.org by maflcko)
* [#30619](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30619) (doc: Change `nproc` in docs to `getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN` by l0rinc)
* [#30527](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30527) (Bump python minimum supported version to 3.10 by maflcko)
* [#30465](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30465) (depends: Set `CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION` for CMake builds by hebasto)
* [#30043](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30043) (net: Replace libnatpmp with built-in PCP+NATPMP implementation by laanwj)
* [#29881](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29881) (guix: use GCC 13 to builds releases by fanquake)
* [#29868](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29868) (Reintroduce external signer support for Windows by hebasto)
* [#25573](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25573) ([POC] guix: produce a fully `-static-pie` bitcoind by fanquake)
* [#19461](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19461) (multiprocess: Add bitcoin-gui -ipcconnect option by ryanofsky)
* [#19460](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19460) (multiprocess: Add bitcoin-wallet -ipcconnect option by ryanofsky)
* [#10102](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10102) (Multiprocess bitcoin by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

rename.from: fuzz: Add missing fuzz targets to cmake build
rename.to: fuzz: Add missing fuzz targets to cmake build

events.body:
> Can be tested via:
> 
> ```
> PRINT_ALL_FUZZ_TARGETS_AND_ABORT=1 ./bld-autot/src/test/fuzz/fuzz > /tmp/f_autot
> PRINT_ALL_FUZZ_TARGETS_AND_ABORT=1 ./bld-cmake/src/test/fuzz/fuzz > /tmp/f_cmake
> diff --unified /tmp/{f_autot,f_cmake}
> ```

Such a check can be automated: https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr30712_amended.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -5,6 +5,7 @@
 include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CoverageInclude.cmake)
 
 set(functional_test_runner test/functional/test_runner.py)
+list(APPEND functional_test_runner --timeout-factor=8)  # Required, because coverage builds are slower
comments.body:
I've noticed the same -- https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/issues/341#issuecomment-2310510852:
> However, on my machine, I had to add `--timeout-factor=4`.
